message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XRV_REFERENCE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Reference Number %1n already exists.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Name' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_NAME_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_ADDITIONAL_NAME_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_ENQUIRY_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Enquiry Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_NO_OF_CHILDREN_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_ZERO
message.locale: Number of Children must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_AVAILABILITY_FOR_CONTACT_ENTERED_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ENTERED_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XFV_ENDDATE_MUST_NOT_BE_EARLIER_THAN_ENQUIRY_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enquiry Date, %2d.
The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enquiry Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_PROVIDER_TYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Provider Type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_PREFERRED_SESSION_ENTERED_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_SCHEDULED_MEETING_ENTERED_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_REASON_FOR_ENQUIRY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Reason for Enquiry' must be entered.
'Reason for Enquiry' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XRV_USER_CANNOT_MODIFY_CLOSED_ENQUIRY
message.locale: This enquiry has already been closed, it cannot be modified.
This enquiry has already been closed, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XRV_USER_CANNOT_TRANSFER_CLOSED_ENQUIRY
message.locale: This enquiry has already been closed, it cannot be transferred.
This enquiry has already been closed, it cannot be transferred.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XRV_USER_CANNOT_CLOSE_CLOSED_ENQUIRY
message.locale: This enquiry has already been closed.
This enquiry has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XFV_CONTACT_DETAILS_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: At least one address or one phone number must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_ENQUIRY_FV_NUMBER_OF_CHILDREN_INVALID
message.locale: The value of the field Number Of Children field must be between %1n and %2n.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_FV_NUMBER_OF_CHILDREN_GT_ZERO
message.locale: The value of the field Number Of Children must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XRV_USER_CANNOT_TRANSFER_TRANSFERED_ENQUIRY
message.locale: This enquiry has already been transfered into enrolled provider.
This enquiry has already been transfered into enrolled provider.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XRV_USER_CANNOT_CLOSE_TRANSFERED_ENQUIRY
message.locale: This enquiry is not 'Open', it can not be closed.
This enquiry is not 'Open', it can not be closed.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XRV_USER_CANNOT_MODIFY_TRANSFERED_ENQUIRY
message.locale: This enquiry is '%1c', it can not be modified.
This enquiry is '%1c', it can not be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_PREFFERED_LANGUAGE_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: The Preferred Language must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_PREFFERED_COMMUNICATION_METHOD_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: The Preferred communication method must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_XRV_PROVIDER_ENQUIRY_PREFFERED_LANGUAGE_DOES_NOT_MATCH_USER_SKILLS_LANGUAGE
message.locale: The Preferred Language, %1c, of the provider enquiry does not match any language in the user skills.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_ENQUIRY_FV_NUMBER_OF_CHILDREN_NOT_WHOLE_NUMBER
message.locale: The field 'Number Of Children' must be a whole number.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_ENQUIRY_XRV_OWNER_IS_NOT_A_VALID_ORGOBJECT
message.locale: The organization object selected as owner is not valid.
The organisation object selected as owner is not valid.

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERENQUIRY_ENQUIRIES_MADE
message.locale: Created

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERENQUIRY_FV_NAME_EXCEEDS_MAXLIMIT
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.
